attributes.action: I would like the legal definition of rape be changed
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see the legal definition updated to having sexual intercourse with another against their consent. This would allow men who have been forced to have sex with a woman against their will to report this as rape.
attributes.background: The current legal definition  of rape states that it is the act of penetrating with a penis without consent. This means that by definition, a woman can not rape a man by having sex against his will

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Change the law so women can be prosecuted for rape under the relevant Act: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/659276
